Package org.cesecore.authentication.tokens

Class X509CertificateAuthenticationToken

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cesecore.authentication.tokens.AuthenticationToken
      • org.cesecore.authentication.tokens.LocalJvmOnlyAuthenticationToken
        • org.cesecore.authentication.tokens.NestableAuthenticationToken
          • org.cesecore.authentication.tokens.X509CertificateAuthenticationToken
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    public class X509CertificateAuthenticationToken
extends NestableAuthenticationToken
    This is an implementation of the AuthenticationToken concept, based on using an X509Certificate as it's single credential, and that certificate's X500Principal as its principle, but as the X500Principle is contained in the X509Certificate, this remains little more than a formality. This AuthenticationToken is the default used in EJBCA.

    The implementation of the matches(...) method is based on AdminEntity.java 10832 2010-12-13 13:54:25Z anatom from EJBCA.

    Version:
    $Id: X509CertificateAuthenticationToken.java 31393 2019-02-05 11:07:23Z samuellb $
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • X509CertificateAuthenticationToken

        public X509CertificateAuthenticationToken​(Set<X500Principal> principals,
                                          Set<X509Certificate> credentials)
        Standard constructor for X509CertificateAuthenticationToken.
        Parameters:
        principals - A set of X500Principals. Should contain one and only one value.
        credentials - A set of X509Certificates. As with the principals, this set should contain one and only one value, anything else will result in a InvalidAuthenticationTokenException being thrown.

      • X509CertificateAuthenticationToken

        public X509CertificateAuthenticationToken​(X509Certificate aCertificate)
        Standard simplified constructor for X509CertificateAuthenticationToken.
        Parameters:
        aCertificate - A X509Certificate that will be used as principal and credential.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the provided certificate is null

      • matches

        public boolean matches​(AccessUserAspect accessUser)
        Description copied from class: AuthenticationToken
        This method will take an AccessUserAspectData entity and return whether or not it matches to this AuthenticationToken. Will specifically check for locality if required.
        Specified by:
        matches in class AuthenticationToken
        Parameters:
        accessUser - An AccessUserAspectData entity to match.
        Returns:
        true if matching.

      • getPreferredMatchKey

        public int getPreferredMatchKey()
        Description copied from class: AuthenticationToken
        Returns the preferred match key for this type of authentication token. E.g. serial number for X.509 tokens If not applicable to this authentication token, then it returns AuthenticationToken.NO_PREFERRED_MATCH_KEY.
        Specified by:
        getPreferredMatchKey in class AuthenticationToken
        Returns:
        Key
